unnormalised: Shikshan Mantralay aplem mukhel yojne, "Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan," navin rup divpak toyar zata, atam tantun "PM SHRI Schools Yojana 2.0" mhunn husharchyea torean navin nav diunk asa (kiteak ".0" dovorn hem sogllem odik bore disota, barem?). Sodheachem suruwaticho tarikh? Ek sambhavit shubh 15/08/2024.
normalised: Ministry of Education apli mukhya yojana "Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan," novyaan suru korpak toyaar asa, aani tikaa ataa chalaakichi "P-M S-H-R-I Schools Yojana two point zero" mhonnun nav deunk asa (kiteak "point zero" add kelear sogllem mast distaa, sorem?). Sandechit suruvaatichi tarik? Sambhavtah shubh pandraa August don hozaar chovis.

unnormalised: Zori sangtat ki budget vadounk vetat, kitleak tor, ek gazillion rupiya (adhikrut tor, Rs. 10,000 cr, pun kon zerancho hissob korta?). Yojna? Astelea shallancher thoddi jaduchi dhul (vacha: sadhana) udounk, tankam "model schools" korpak. Hogwarts assa mhunn chintat, pun odik midday meal-am sangata.
normalised: Soothr sangtaa ki budget vaddoitaa, kiteak, ek gazillion rupia (officially, rupia dha hozaar koti, pun kon zero meltat?). Yojana? Asteleaa shalaancher thoddi jaadoochi dhuull (vacha: resources) fankaunk, tankaa "model schools" korunk. Hogwarts vicharaat ghea, pun odik midday meals-aan.

unnormalised: Dishta ki uddes "Gross Enrolment Ratio" (GER) sudharpak asa, jem, satyam sangpak, ek german beer bhaxen disota shikshannachea mapna poros. Dhyeam-ant 2027 meren gramin bhagant 99.99% GER vaddo aspaachem asa. Tumkam subhechha, bhavanno!
normalised: Dishṭṭavo distaa ki maqsad "Gross Enrolment Ratio" (G-E-R) sudharopachi asa, ji sachi sangtat, ekaa German beera sarkhi distaa shikshonachi metrik aslean. Targets-ant don hozaar aani sattavis poryaan graameen bhaagant nobdhyaan nau point nobdhyaan nau percent G-E-R vaddoitaat. Dev tumchi madat karo, bhaaionno!

unnormalised: Temnnachean, nindak aplea penshila tokdar kortat, sangtat ki asli yojna, ji 2001 vorsa suru zali, tanem azun pasun sarkari shallanchi golpi chodri sudharunk na ani shikshakanchi gairhajri attounk na, ji sumar 30% kitlich astam kitlinch rajyant. Dekhun, hem "ujjvall" yesh zatolem, vo kednach babuchea office-ant dhul zoma kortoli file? Fott tim (ani odik funds) sangteli.
normalised: Tyaach velar, tikaakaar aple peencil poltaait, sangtaat ki mool yojana, ji don hozaar aani ekaan suru zali, tinnem sarkari shalaantli gaaļchi chapraam aani teacher nastenaasopachi problem sudhaarunk na, ji kaim raajyaant trees percent asa. Mhunnttleaar, hi "chamchamaati" yashasvithaai astali, vo fakt ek file konnacheai babu office-ant dhuull melloun astali? Fakt vell (aani odik funding) sangtaali.
